QuestData.Title: The Legacy of Tyrhold
QuestData.Description:
Keeper Tyr did love his mysteries. Clearly, there is deeper meaning to the gift he gave us. As he most likely forged this scale at his former citadel, perhaps it will be the key to helping unlock its secrets.
Go with Koranos to Tyrhold, $n. As a trusted advisor and watcher of this land, I am sure he will have insight into this matter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Silver Scale with Koranos at Tyrhold.

Objectives.Objective: Use the Tyrhold Teleporter in the Seat of the Aspects
